thread.title: Westwood falling in love with its new Wegmans
thread.title_full: Westwood falling in love with its new Wegmans

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Westwood falling in love with its new Wegmans
text:
People who know swear by Wegmans, unless you don't have one in your area. Now the folks in Westwood, Massachusetts are getting a taste with the local grocer's newest store , a 122,000-square-foot mammoth located about 25 miles southwest of Boston that opened on Sunday.
All the things locals have come to enjoy about Wegmans ‚Äî the Market Caf√©, a top-ranked pharmacy and prepared foods area, and a large variety of food ‚Äî are in the Westwood store. One thing you'll find there, and not here, is a wine and beer shop.
Here's a roundup of tweets from those visiting the grocer's newest store that may just leave your mouth watering for more.
Tweets Just went to the new @Wegmans in #westwood #omg my new favorite place #FB
‚Äî Jason (@simplyJA5ON) October 11, 2015 Opening day at the #Wegmans down the street and there's wine as far as the eye can see! üç∑üòç There's‚Ä¶ https://t.co/iSJ39Zvs4f
‚Äî Sarah (@whatsarahread) October 11, 2015 Am I the only that gets excited when I'm in the fruit and veg isle? #wegmans #eatclean ‚Ä¶ https://t.co/H6wlxi7WP9
‚Äî Agnes (@SpoonsStilettos) October 11, 2015 @Wegmans That's me with our kids Jackson & Campbell! They've been to every opening in MA. First one in utero. :-) cc @TVSassone
‚Äî Kara Sassone (@karamat) October 11, 2015 @Wegmans staff seemed as excited if not more so than I was! Great team, glad you're finally open!!
‚Äî Shari (@EssJay919) October 11, 2015 @Wegmans @UniversityStn I am so excited to have my favorite grocery store down the street. Used to live near the Northborough location.
‚Äî Caren B. (@CarenBeth) October 11, 2015 The first time J&C "met" Danny they were in utero. They've made it to every MA opening! @JeffCutler @Clownface3 https://t.co/nYh4j5JErC
‚Äî Kara Sassone (@karamat) October 11, 2015 Vegetable sushi from @Wegmans #Westwood #Wegmaniac pic.twitter.com/TUKyYdwe0P
‚Äî Lin (@Lin_Dolin) October 11, 2015 At #Wegmans opening day in Westwood #Mistake #insanity #claustrophobia
‚Äî Lee Gesmer (@gesmer) October 11, 2015 Braved the crowd and went to Wegmans. Let me tell you, it was worth every elbow I almost threw.‚Ä¶ https://t.co/YmC2bs2YPK
‚Äî Carly Walter (@cl_walter) October 11, 2015 Wegmans Grand Opening! https://t.co/FJLPQbrf4d
‚Äî Steve Garfield (@stevegarfield) October 11, 2015 So is it sad the highlight of my day is a trip to our brand new Wegmans‚Ä¶.no, I am going with no.
‚Äî Justin Parmelee (@justinparmelee) October 11, 2015 People waiting in line to go into a new grocery store at 645 on a Sunday. And people respond: "but it's a @Wegmans " pic.twitter.com/3Aw3h5EuQA
‚Äî Blair Miller (@BlairMillerTV) October 11, 2015 Just beyond the Norwood/Westwood line, @Wegmans opens at @UniversityStn today.
‚Äî Brad Cole (@bradcolewrites) October 11, 2015 First came the postcards with job offers. Then came the ads to shop there. This morning Wegmans parking lot is full ; -)
‚Äî Mitch Rudnick (@QuincyBroker) October 11, 2015 Great @Wegmans opening in Westwood Ma this AM! Thank you for offering so many #kosher products! #wegmaniac pic.twitter.com/EhBjsrnSuG
‚Äî Dana Reichman Gitell (@DRGtweets) October 11, 2015 I love that these all have a colonial flair to them. #WegmansWestwood @ Wegmans Westwood https://t.co/Hd3UmYAi9l
‚Äî Margo Romanowski (@ariadne300) October 11, 2015 @Wegmans grand opening was crazy. Lots of people, but twice as many staff members! Well done!
‚Äî Paul Lurie (@plurie) October 11, 2015 @Wegmans thank you, never felt so welcomed in a store! #AlwaysComingBack #YouGotYourselfANewCustomer
‚Äî Sarah Marie‚ô° (@ScrubsAndXboxs) October 11, 2015 You say that like you're not at Wegman's on a Sunday for its grand opening. @ Wegmans Westwood https://t.co/Ftqnmzmx4t
‚Äî Heather Hedy F (@Hedytf) October 11, 2015 Coconut shrimp rolls are my new obsession. Thanks #wegmans #soyummy #obsessed pic.twitter.com/v1CL4oe4JU
‚Äî √∏¬§¬∫‚òÖsŒ±—èŒ±–Ω‚òÖ¬∫¬§√∏ (@Girl_On_Fire91) October 12, 2015 Just went to the brand new @Wegmans in Westwood and got 7-10 days worth of groceries (breakfast, lunch & dinner) for $66! Stoked!
‚Äî calebmcnaughton (@calebmcnaughton) October 12, 2015 The new @Wegmans is so much more than I expected! I am beyond impressed, they even had dragon fruit!
‚Äî ashley (@aej0x) October 12, 2015 New grocery stores mean new shiny shopping carts. But the new @Wegmans in Westwood- impressed all around.
‚Äî Mindy Bartleson (@mindy_bartleson) October 12, 2015 @Wegmans Went to the new #Westwood store and had a great first impression! Will be coming back especially if you can improve the wifi :)
‚Äî Brian Hurst (@BrianCeltics1) October 12, 2015 Danny is so excited about the warm welcome at Westwood. We can't thank you enough! pic.twitter.com/NGXOWmsRdW
‚Äî Wegmans Food Markets (@Wegmans) October 11, 2015 ROCHESTER DEMOCRAT AND CHRONICLE
Chao: 5 reasons why America loves Wegmans
TCLAUSEN@Gannett.com
